item.title: 无论是亲戚还是朋友，美联航现在都允许其前程万里（MileagePlus）会员使用一项新功能，在一个联名账户中最多可有五人贡献和合并里程。
item.description:
Whether it's relatives or friends, United now allows its MileagePlus members to access a new feature to contribute and combine miles into one joint account with up to five people. https://t.co/C2cwbNelli

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 由于以色列继续表示计划向拉法发动地面进攻，援助组织警告说，入侵将是对平民的 "血洗"，并加深加沙地带的人道主义危机。
item.description:
As Israel continues to indicate plans to launch a ground offensive into Rafah, aid organizations warn that an invasion would be a "bloodbath" for civilians and deepen the humanitarian crisis in the Gaza Strip. https://t.co/Um7BbUlKDa

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 太空天气预报员发布了将持续到下周一的地磁暴警报，称太阳耀斑喷发出的等离子体可能会干扰地球上的无线电传输。不过，这也可能成为观赏极光的绝佳机会。
item.description:
Space weather forecasters have issued a geomagnetic storm watch through Monday, saying an ouburst of plasma from a solar flare could interfere with radio transmissions on Earth. It could also make for great aurora viewing.https://t.co/2VDbq5Mi2s

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 根据最新研究，全球气温上升可能对农业和全球通货膨胀造成的压力将可能导致食品价格进一步上涨。
item.description:
The strain that rising global temperatures could have on the agriculture industry and inflation around the world will likely cause food prices to increase even more, according to new research. https://t.co/VyUCs0Wxx0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 参议员马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）在很大程度上为唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的起诉豁免权辩护，因为这位前总统正面临数起刑事审判。"我确实认为这里有一个合理的问题，我们需要广泛讨论。
item.description:
Sen. Marco Rubio largely defended Donald Trump's claims of immunity against prosecution as the former president faces several criminal trials.

"I do think there's a legitimate issue here that we need to talk about writ large.” https://t.co/j1ZTkvfvYL pic.twitter.com/l0ufHfAb9e

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 在意大利翁布里亚大区，喜欢刺激的自然爱好者可以鸟瞰田园风光--如果他们有足够的勇气踏上一个新景点--一座悬挂在河谷上方 570 多英尺处的 "西藏 "式桥梁。
item.description:
Thrill-seeking nature lovers in Italy's Umbria region can get a bird's-eye view of the countryside — if they're brave enough to step foot on a new attraction, a "Tibetan"-style bridge suspended more than 570 feet above a river valley. pic.twitter.com/Fyp5hYCQE9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 五角大楼确认在红海失踪后死亡的水手身份。
item.description:
Pentagon identifies sailor who died after going missing in Red Sea. https://t.co/4jmdEyd34I

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 在南非皮拉尼斯堡国家公园，一头公象与一辆野生动物园卡车发生紧张对峙，受惊的游客纷纷躲到座位之间。
item.description:
Frightened tourists can be seen ducking between seats during a tense standoff between a bull elephant and a safari truck in Pilanesberg National Park, South Africa. https://t.co/lAPrmLopw1

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 捉鬼仍然是一门好生意。"捉鬼敢死队据制片厂估计，《捉妖记：冰封帝国》周末票房收入达 4520 万美元。本周末上映的另一部新片，由悉尼-斯威尼主演的《无懈可击》首次亮相，排名第 4。
item.description:
Ghost busting is still a good business. “Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire” collected $45.2 million in ticket sales over the weekend, according to studio estimates. The weekend’s other new release, "Immaculate," starring Sydney Sweeney debuted at No. 4. https://t.co/hF393r26LG

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 阿拉斯加费尔班克斯的观众看到了一场炫目的表演，极光的色彩在天空中飞舞。
item.description:
Spectators in Fairbanks, Alaska, were in for a dazzling show as the colors of an aurora borealis danced across the sky. https://t.co/RXiu4ZesC3 pic.twitter.com/uJBS3gfQ4i

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 巴西本周末的暴雨已造成东南部里约热内卢州和圣埃斯皮里图州之间至少 23 人死亡。
item.description:
Heavy rains in Brazil this weekend have killed at least 23 people between the southeastern states of Rio de Janeiro and Espirito Santo. https://t.co/fjsSmxYYN2

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 上周是正式立春的第一天，但数百万美国人仍然感受到冬天的气息，因为美国部分地区正准备迎接席卷全国的大暴风雪。
item.description:
Last week marked the first official day of spring, but millions of Americans are still feeling winter weather as parts of the U.S. brace for a major snowstorm sweeping across the country. https://t.co/fJRjL63fUL

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 凯文-哈特（Kevin Hart）周日将在肯尼迪表演艺术中心（Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts）的一场盛大演出中被授予马克-吐温美国幽默奖（Mark Twain Prize for American Humor）。以往的获奖者包括乔治-卡林、乌比-戈德堡、鲍勃-纽哈特、卡罗尔-伯内特和戴夫-查佩尔。
item.description:
Kevin Hart is being honored Sunday with the Mark Twain Prize for American Humor during a gala performance at the Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts.

Past honorees include George Carlin, Whoopi Goldberg, Bob Newhart, Carol Burnett and Dave Chapelle. https://t.co/fOG5FjeQwj pic.twitter.com/dp2HTAYrVJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：新泽西州第一夫人塔米-墨菲（Tammy Murphy）将结束参议员竞选，从而缩短了与众议员安迪-金（Andy Kim）的民主党初选。
item.description:
BREAKING: New Jersey's first lady Tammy Murphy is ending her Senate campaign, cutting short what was shaping up to be a protracted Democratic primary against Rep. Andy Kim. https://t.co/1qU4iMSvou

— ABC News Politics (@ABCPolitics) March 24, 2024

item.title: 埃里克-亚当斯（Eric Adams）市长原计划访问美墨边境，因为他所在的城市正在努力安置寻求庇护的新移民。但亚当斯的办公室说，美国国务院提出了安全问题，促使他取消了这次行程。
item.description:
Mayor Eric Adams was slated to visit the U.S.-Mexico border as his city struggles to house new migrants seeking asylum. But Adams’ office said the U.S. State Department flagged safety concerns that prompted him to cancel the trip. https://t.co/QKEtrjSPrr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 肯辛顿宫表示，凯特-米德尔顿和威廉王子在宣布被诊断出患有癌症后，都被大家的祝福 "深深感动"。
item.description:
Kate Middleton and Prince William are both "enormously touched" by the well wishes following her announcement that she was diagnosed with cancer, Kensington Palace said. https://t.co/1qZA5cqMGt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 联合国秘书长安东尼奥-古特雷斯（António Guterres）说，现在是 "真正向加沙提供大量救生援助 "的时候了，并称飞地内的饥饿是 "道德上的暴行"。
item.description:
UN Secretary-General António Guterres says it's time to “truly flood Gaza with lifesaving aid" and calls the starvation inside the enclave a “moral outrage.” https://t.co/scEk50Hba9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 新的监控视频显示，一名男子在登上达美航空公司的航班之前偷拍了其他人的登机牌。
item.description:
New surveillance video appears to show a man taking pictures of other people’s boarding passes before he was allegedly able to board a Delta flight.https://t.co/qqt3K2sQIm pic.twitter.com/WZTwLCyOTH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 当 @rachelvscott 问及如果以色列不顾反对按计划入侵拉法追捕哈马斯战士，"美国是否会承担后果 "时，副总统哈里斯说："我不排除任何可能性。
item.description:
When pressed by @rachelvscott on whether there will be “consequences from the United States” if Israel moves forward with a planned invasion of Rafah in pursuit of Hamas fighters despite opposition, Vice Pres. Harris says, “I am ruling out nothing.” https://t.co/5xzrRdwwdg pic.twitter.com/QpwW8QtkJW

— This Week (@ThisWeekABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 当局说，两兄弟周末到北加州森林郊游时遭遇了山狮袭击，导致其中一人死亡，另一人面部受伤，情况十分危急。
item.description:
A weekend outing to the Northern California woods took a horrific turn for two brothers when a mountain lion attacked them, killing one and leaving the other with traumatic injuries to the face, authorities said. https://t.co/3X4B3kBjF9 pic.twitter.com/X1JrI9spYY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 美国副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）对拜登的竞选团队为何在可能的禁令立法中拥有一个 TikTok 账户进行了回避。"所以，让我们从这个开始：我们不打算禁止 TikTok"。
item.description:
Vice President Kamala Harris is deflecting on why Biden's campaign has a TikTok account amid potential ban legislation. "So, let's start with this: We do not intend to ban TikTok." https://t.co/YaihABmmHR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 一项新的分析显示，目前在美国买房要比租房贵得多，预计至少在未来五年内，房地产市场都将如此。
item.description:
Buying a house in the U.S. is considerably more expensive than renting right now, and the real estate market is expected to stay that way for at least the next five years, according to a new analysis. https://t.co/HeQ1K3M0lb pic.twitter.com/CvG8NvjZBw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 悼念：2021 年的今天，因出演《逮捕行动》和《Archer》而闻名的女演员杰西卡-沃尔特（Jessica Walter）去世。享年 80 岁。
item.description:
IN MEMORIAM: On this day in 2021, Jessica Walter, an actress best known for roles on "Arrested Development" and "Archer," died. She was 80. https://t.co/MiD4om2KAY pic.twitter.com/cgSm3VRBav

item.title: 教皇方济各在最后一刻决定跳过在圣彼得广场举行的棕枝主日弥撒中的讲道，避免在繁忙的圣周开始时发表艰苦的演讲，这将是对他健康的考验。
item.description:
Pope Francis decided at the last minute to skip his homily during Palm Sunday Mass in St. Peter’s Square, avoiding a strenuous speech at the start of a busy Holy Week that will test his health. https://t.co/E0WrACDlob

— ABC News (@ABC) March 24, 2024

item.title: 阿曼尼-巴卢尔博士在新书中详细介绍了她作为叙利亚战时医院唯一女院长所做的工作，以及她在男性主导的环境中坚持不懈的精神。
item.description:
